entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] interpreter timeouts when WebSocket closes unexpectedly #84101
    8.0.0
  • Update Compiler::optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock() #84098
    8.0.0
  • Deadlock when using TryStartNoGCRegion and/or GC.Collect #84096
  • Optimizing a runtime-generated constant value #84094
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Monitoring HTTP3 read and written bytes #84093
  • Process crash on simultaneous call of EventListener.DisposeOnShutdown() and EventListener.EnableEvents() #84091
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to detect Binary Format (MS-NRBF) header #84090
  • Ensure XMM16-XMM31 and K0-K7 are handled where appropriate #84087
  • Blazor WASM project will not debug if index.html file includes some scripts with crossorigin #84086
  • Xamarin Android C# - use of Substring() in Array.IndexOf does not work #84084
  • Add event log for `System.Threading.Tasks.Task.CancellationPromise` as is done in `DelayPromise` #84081
  • [API Proposal]: Add support to configure SocketsHttpHandler for named HttpClient instances with IOptions #84075
  • [mono][debugger] Implement Mono debugger support for structs with InlineArrayAttribute #84071
    8.0.0
  • JSON attributes docs should have mentions for corresponding metadata #84069
    Future
  • Running .NET 6 single file binary with enabled compression on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #84066
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 01 Mar 2023 #84065
    8.0.0
  • `System.Action` assignable to `System.Action<>` #84061
  • JIT: tracking down and fixing stray dependences on bbNum #84052
    Future

Closed

  • Static tests in abstract classes aren't running #83617
  • "Build Analysis" report is missing a build break in a test #84049
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CrlBuilderTests.LoadPreservesUnknownExtensions #82694
    Future
  • Runtime repository is missing 7.0.3 release #82712
    8.0.0
  • GetSystemTimeZones() returns incorrect StandardName etc. #83924
  • About. net6 executable files on window os #83977
    Future
  • Platform_TimeZoneNames failing for Iran time zones on macOS #83901
    Future
  • [.NET 6.0.5] HeapValidate() returns false for the last heap returned by GetProcessHeaps(), when both WinAPI calls are made thru P/Invoke #83883
    8.0.0
  • Json EnumSerialization_DictionaryPolicy_ThrowsException_WhenNamingPolicyReturnsNull test fails with wrong exception #84053
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Take required modifier into account when validating options. #81750
    Future
  • VersionConverter throws NullReferenceException if Version is null #84037
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 10 Regressions on 12/12/2022 1:43:17 AM #79876
    8.0.0
  • Respect language version in config binding source generator #83535
    8.0.0
  • CultureInfo("nb-NO") not working correctly for iOS on .NET 7 #79347
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Add MemoryStream.ctor(Memory<byte>) #84103
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2147000 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    area-Host
  • Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84099
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement GC descriptor for structs with InlineArray attribute #84097
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Switch attribute equality to the valuetype equality plan #84095
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Static cctor analysis for reflection #84089
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_SHL_AND_ in the jiterpreter #84083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Passing --no-sandbox argument to Chrome Startup on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't overwrite pinned assembly versions in servicing #84079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • update data annotation error message #84078
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] remove unneeded PKG_CONFIG_PATH for FreeBSD #84062
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Making thread local storage completely managed. #84060
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Re-enable null check optimization for mid-method traces #84058
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Fix re-use val zero on GC tracking #84051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • wip test #84050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Smaller static constructor context #83937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating some places to cover xmm16-xmm31 #84088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove double quotes from OwnerCompositeExecutable #83552
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Fix #84053 #84070
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Fix Iran time zone test case #84057
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime
  • [7.0] Fix Iran time zone test case #84056
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime
  • Unroll SequenceEqual(ref byte, ref byte, nuint) in JIT #83945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement integer log2 in jiterpreter #84068
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter back branch optimizations #84067
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove HybridGlobalization info from linker feature switches #84073
    area-Meta, area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Streamline a few members of char #84024
    area-System.Runtime
  • Make use of "space" and "whitespace" consistent in emitted regex comments #84055
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix static test methods on abstract classes #84054
    needs-area-label
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2146466 #84063
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Add super instruction for common left shift pattern #83512
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Set minimum language version allowed by config binding generator #83996
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #83557
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] disable NTLM tests on RedHat.7 #83602
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, test-bug, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Disable more unsupported runtime tests #83731
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/6.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83728
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Bump to new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83729
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Coalesce identical constant WordCategories #84047
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Boost hit count for outer back branch targets; improve conditional execution detection #83630
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Updated

  • Expose helper APIS for GetLower/Upper and WithLower/Upper #83982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert #80698 and obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #84022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.6
  • Add arm64 wasm support #83677
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Implement the STJ.UseReflectionDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.6
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.17
  • Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#80581) #84028
    area-System.Reflection
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Enabled Sqrt and Abs intrinsics #84011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [release/7.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83966
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.6
  • [Mono] Intrinsify multiply and divide for mini JIT on ARM64 #84004
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83574
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.6
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Convert JIT\Regression tests to merged test groups #83895
    test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • don't load MsQuic unless needed by HttpClient #83494
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ignore expiration in NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test #83157
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-order some blocks in runtimelookup #83453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.content:

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Options.dll has version 7.0.1 at Nuget but downloaded DLL is version 7.0.0.0 #31527
  • System.Buffers, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, etc cannot be loaded #31147
  • Installing .NET SDK v7.0.201 causes a crash when trying to load a Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project. #31141
    Discussion
  • Updating sign tool to 0.9.0-beta.23127.3 gives stack dump #31168
  • dotnet tool install should return exit code 0 if tool is already installed #9500
    Discussion
  • .NET tool does not seem to find the SDK #30546
  • Exclude entire packages from single-file #25411
  • Enable C# language version 12 in `CommonTemplatesTests` #29195
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet clean --runtime gives NETSDK1179 #22747
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2146929 #31526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31511
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.1 to 19.11.2 in /eng/dependabot #31464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Use latest dogfood version #31469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using built-in package for package reference to `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` #31488
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update off-by-default analyzers to account for rename #31460
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Wasm SDK code owners #31489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.1 to 19.11.2 in /eng/dependabot #31463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Add AfterPublish target to ClickOnce target dependencies #31313
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • Add breaking change notification to the bot #31413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable a skipped cppcli test. #31386
    untriaged
  • First pass at source build pre-built detection #31341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • extend search table with trusted and owners info #31403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for Instance Members in `nameof` #67565
    C# 12.0
  • Move BoundInterpolatedString placeholders to the containing BoundCall #67557
  • region cannot be collapsed #67555
  • Reference an Analyzer with dependencies via ProjectReference #67548
  • Implicit index indexer doesn't work in object initializer #67533

Closed

  • Remove IsBlocking properties from CodeRefactoringContext and CodeFixContext #61122
  • [caret placement] Extract Interface #13503
    Backlog
  • `NullReferenceException` in `RefSafetyAnalysis.GetValEscape` #67070
    17.5
  • IDE0051 erroneously triggers for required awaitable/awaiter members #62856
    Backlog
  • No ref safety error reported for switch expression with locals used in switch statement or foreach statement expression #67493
    17.6
  • record ToString Questions and suggestions #67552
  • False-positive for IDE0251 Make member readonly #67531

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update LSP package and avoid send workspace/configuration request to client if client doesn't have the ability #67560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VB Extract Interface to use GetRelevantNode #67559
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize some SegmentedArrayHelper members for JIT #67558
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Port: "Fix incorrect 'isExplicit' value in CodeFixService #67547" to main #67556
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify logic for lightbulb priority classes #67554
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify DirectorySeparatorChar in PathUtilities #67545
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.7-vs-deps #67544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove legacy 'IsBlocking' internal flag from code actions #67549
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use 'DoNot' instead of contraction 'Dont' in symbol names #67550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Remove descendent node tracking from SyntaxEditor #67314" from 17.6 #67551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Ensure placeholders and locals are registered in RefSafetyAnalysis before escape analysis #67155
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Remove existing sync lightbulb code #67540
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix incorrect 'isExplicit' value in CodeFixService #67547
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for synchronous lightbulbs #67536
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67546
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Infra] Merge main to release/dev17.6 #67539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.7-vs-deps #67538
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67537
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issues with 'fixed size buffer' and 'make method readonly' #67535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Infra] Update for 17.6 P3 snap #67534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build errors coming from RequestDelegateGenerator generated code instead of my code #47488
  • Add NativeAOT support for JwtBearer Authentication #47487
  • Add Documentation for ASP.NET+AOT #47486
  • WEB API 6.0 - Return 500 instead of 401 when post large data with anonymous #47483
  • net core 7 razor pages release ViewData page garbled on docker #47479
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Model binder in Razor View #47480
  • Skipping Helix queues for native AOT publishing test cases #47478

Closed

  • Add API for Kestrel named pipes transport #44612
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add an option to disable DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware with WebApplication / Minimal APIs #47293
  • [AOT] Meta issue for warnings from outside of aspnetcore #45911
  • Adding AddDefaultHttpJsonOptions extension method #46490
    .NET 8 Planning
  • NavigationLock silently throws JSDisconnected exception with OnBeforeInternalNavigation #47109
    8.0-preview4
  • Any plans to add Token generation back into ASP.NET Core #47256
  • Please consider Extensions to Blazor WASM elements? #47466
  • [ASPNET Core 2.1] src\SignalR\clients\csharp\Http.Connections.Client\src\HttpConnection.cs should null check logging scope before disposing #47470
  • img decoding="async" with blazor #47449
  • StringUtilities based on vectorized helpers provided by core libraries #45962
    .NET 8 Planning
  • React to RDG name change in SDK for preview4 #47359
    8.0-preview4
  • Allow configuration of request/response buffer limits for TestServer #47401

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial streaming SSR mechanisms #47484
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Support populating cache without serving from it. #47481
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Bump okhttp to 4.10.0 #47455
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview4
  • Use Json TypeInfoResolverChain #47450
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • Bump gson to 2.8.9. #47453
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix title in `Extensions.ApiDescription.Server` README.md #47485
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix unobserved JSDisconnectedException in NavigationManager #47356
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #47459
    Perf, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #3341
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.targets` breaks build on macOS #14279
  • [iOS] X and Y constraints ignored when width, height, X and Y constraints are all specified on RelativeLayout child. #14277
  • RoundRectangle StrokeShape produces a different result on iOS vs Android #14276
    Backlog
  • .net maui & ios #14273
  • "Authorization code" OAuth flow not supported by WebAuthenticator #14272
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Trimming / AOT issue after publish in .NET MAUI Blazor app #14271
  • PickMultipleAsync is not working on IOS .net 7 #14270
  • Compiler errors #14267
  • AdaptiveTrigger in style for multiple elements does not work #14259
    Backlog
  • Support DisplayAlert from PresentedViewController #14258
    Backlog
  • VerticalStackLayout inside Scrollview: Button at the bottom not clickable on IOS #14257
    Backlog

Closed

  • HorizontalStackLayout to use full width #14177
  • Debugging/Deployment in iOS with net7.0 is broken #13340
  • Border StrokeThickness decreases Height on Android #13011
    Backlog
  • Border.StrokeShape clips content on Android, not iOS #13388
    Backlog
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
    Backlog
  • Border control for image with rounded corners doesnt work on iOS #9952
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI: border not clip image #12580
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Image clipping with border not working #10478
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Strange Border with StrokeThickness and Clipped Content #7521
    Backlog
  • Border Clipping Issue in [iOS & macOS] #10724
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Issue in Clipping Images in Border #6986
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI templates should respect tabs/spaces preferences like other templates #13782
    Backlog
  • Remove solution files from maui templates #14033
  • Automatic font scaling does not work #14260
  • Style (BackgroundColor) is not reflect correctly when in release mode #14266
  • [iOS] Crash during Render after adding items to an ObservableCollection #10163
    .NET 8 Planning

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14246
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758

  • Force menu rebuild when window is closed (#10702) #13709

  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Replace AddAsync with name that better fits use case #30595
  • StoreTypeNameBase isn't trimmed #30592
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [EF CORE 7] Some FluentAPI instruction ignored when configuring Stored Procedure #30584
  • OwnsMany generates multiple delete statements instead of a single SQL statement (EF Core 7.0.4) #30590
  • Find by primary key using named/typed parameters #30587
  • Log Entity Framework queries to new output window source #30576
  • Table-Valued Parameter from local List with Join of DbSet #30556
  • Foreign Key relationships #30542
  • Different configurations for the same property in the base and child classes for Table-per-concrete-type (TPC) #30520
  • Ef core 6 Cosmos provider owned types with "Id" property is mapped as parent entities partition key #30513
  • InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 7.0.4 #30506
  • Navigation Property with backing fields can't work in Lazy Load mode #30498
  • android.runtime.JavaProxyThrowable: System.InvalidOperationException: You specified a password in the connection string, but the native SQLite library you're using doesn't support encryption. at Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection.Open () #30492
  • EF Core 7 Linq with a 'Contains" generates an SQL with an extra 'or is not null' #30483
  • When using sqlite to query a large amount of data, the memory increases #30474
  • Issue with 'optimization' of LINQ to SQL #30385
  • HierarchId: Cannot call methods on varchar #30307
    8.0.0
  • HierarchyId: Don't go through SqlBytes #30305
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30575 - Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30594
  • Trim the mapping store type base name #30593
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix to #30565 - Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30568
  • HierarchyId: Address API Review feedback #30588

Updated

  • Proposed fix for Optional RestartSequenceOperation.StartValue #26560 #29346
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression #30591
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
